item.name: Pre-requisite step

request.description:
create patient resource
create practitioner resource
create one schedule resource for the above practitioner
create 2 slot resources for the above schedule.
Note: before processing this bundle request, please change the patient and practitioner identifiers and the corresponding request URLS

item.description:
Create a bundle consisting of following resources:
1. patient 
2. practitioner
3. schedule for above practitioner - this will be post. So everytime you change the patient and practitioner id, automatically new schedule will be assigned to the referenced practitioner.
4. 2 slots - this will be post. 


Patient
identifier - MRN3780
logicalid - 1283381
name - Peter Hawkins

Practitioner
identifier - Prac48036
logicalid - 1283380
name - Dr. Sheldon Buffet
